e8af3ff0836d5210c888fecfeeaad3048ad1fc8c-a085-41b9-90f0-a5b0ee01480111

Please provide a solution for this issue using relevant knowledge base articles." }; var requestBody = JSON.stringify(incidentData); var restMessage = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2(); restMessage.setEndpoint(databricksEndpoint); restMessage.setHttpMethod("POST"); restMessage.setRequestHeader("Authorization", "Bearer " + databricksToken); restMessage.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json"); restMessage.setRequestBody(requestBody); try { var response = restMessage.execute(); var responseBody = response.getBody(); var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode(); gs.info("Databricks Response Status: " + httpStatus); gs.info("Databricks Response Body: " + responseBody); if (httpStatus === 200) { var parsedResponse = JSON.parse(responseBody); var answer = parsedResponse[0] && parsedResponse[0].answer ? parsedResponse[0].answer : "No answer found."; var incidentGr = new GlideRecord('incident'); if (incidentGr.get('number', incidentNumber)) { gs.info("Updating work notes for incident: " + incidentNumber); incidentGr.work_notes = answer; incidentGr.update(); gs.info("Incident work notes updated successfully."); } else { gs.error("Incident with number " + incidentNumber + " not found."); } } else { gs.error("Databricks returned an error.
